      • getDistance

        public java.lang.Integer getDistance()
        Returns the distance.
        • If the vertex is initialized (infinity), Integer.MAX_VALUE will be returned.
        • If the vertex is not yet initialized (value == ""), null will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getDistance in interface IVertex
        Returns:
        the distance
